title: Community Events
description: How can we increase meaningful participation among the community in the next 6 month?

title: Raise Catalyst's reach & awareness
description: How can we increase the reach and awareness of Project Catalyst to encourage meaningful participation and accelerate adoption of Cardano?

title: DeFi/CeFi Cardano&...TBC in Fund 7
description: How can we create an environment for seamless (no extra fee/delay) integration b/w ADA and FIAT?

title: Community Roadmaps for Cardano 2025
description: How can we encourage development of community-inspired 2025 roadmaps for Cardano to enhance and expand IOG's own roadmap for 2025?

title: Disarm cyber disinformation attacks
description: How can we prevent attempts to destabilize Cardano through Distributed Denial of Truth (DDoT) attack scenarios?

title: Mission Driven Challenge
description:
How do we focus our community's desire to correct imbalances?

A specific challenge addressing mission-driven initiatives.

title: Nation Building Dapps
description: What core Dapp solutions can be provided for widespread governments adoption in the developing world?

title: Grow Latin America, Grow Cardano
description:
How do we grow the Cardano ecosystem in Latin America?

The same way we do in Africa, focused initiatives!

title: Grow East Asia, Grow Cardano
description: How do we grow the Cardano ecosystem in East Asia in an inclusive and supportive way? The same way we do in Africa, focused initiatives!

title: A financial OS for the 99% - now!
description: How can we fast track the delivery of the first benefits of a global financial OS to the average citizen of the world in the next 6 months?

title: Fund Microlending Everywhere
description: What do 60%+ of Latin America, South East Asia, Middle East, and Africa's population have in common?

title: Challenge Governance: The next step
description: How can we enable the next step for the community towards taking full ownership over the governance and frameworks of Challenges and funds?

title: Infrastructure Boost in Africa
description: On a continent with subpar electricity and internet penetration, how can grassroots Africa help realize Cardano's potential & solutions

title: Research Challenge
description: What research can the community fund that will assist in the direction of the catalyst project?

title: Already Approved Project Challenge
description: What more can projects that have already been approved and have successfully delivered value to the ecosystem with extra funding?

title: Increasing Diversity in Catalyst
description: How can we as a community increase diversity, equity, and inclusion in Project Catalyst?

title: Open Source Developer Ecosystem
description: How can we ensure that the cardano ecosystem is build on a framework which is owned by the community and equally accessible to all?

title: Miscellaneous Challenge
description: How do we create a space for ideas and projects that do not fit any of the other current Challenges?

title: Grow Social & Environmental Finance
description: What solutions can we build on Cardano to finance social and environmental innovation?

title: Raising small ghosts, SPOs and devs
description: How to raise small SPOs and developers in the Cardano community?

title: Boosting Cardano's DeFi
description: How can we encourage DeFi teams to build/deploy open finance solutions on Cardano in the next 6 months?

title: Lobbying for favorable legislation
description: How can we defend ourselves from attacks by authoritarian governments and compromising legislation and unfair tax policies?

title: A.I. & SingularityNet a $5T market
description: How can we create a mutually beneficial partnership with SingularityNet and other A.I. developers and researchers?

title: Cardano Ecosystem Gender Equality
description: How can we improve female engagement in the Cardano community in 6-12 months?

title: DAOs <3 Cardano
description: How can we make Cardano the go-to choice for DAOs to manage themselves?

title: Catalyst - Rapid Funding Mechanisms
description: How can we distribute Cardano Treasury funds more rapidly in a transparent, accountable, and safe manner?

title: New SPO Business Opportunities
description: Stake Pool Operators are a key-success-factor of Cardano. With their infrastructure and capabilities, important new services can be created

title: Grow Cardano Act Sustainably
description: How will you drive high impact collaborating in the Cardano + global community to create a more equitable world of shared prosperity?

title: Global Sustainable Indep. SPO's
description: How can we promote a decentralised, globally distributed and sustainable pool of operators to run the Cardano network

title: Prototype Diversified Voting Method
description: Can we implement a prototype demonstration of diversified voting and flexible funding for one challenge fund?

title: Gamers On-Chained
description: What Blockchain gaming applications should be developed to achieve mass adoption of Cardano?

title: Mini/Low-Budget Dapps &Integrations
description: What Low Budget / Mini Decentralized Applications will provide the most value for end users in the next 3 months?

title: Help Small Countries Adopt Cardano
description: Can the Cardano community identify, research and promote valuable use-cases for 5 small ~100k underdeveloped, uniquely challenged countries?

title: Making Web3 Visible
description: How can we help end-users to truly understand the impact of the "Web3 Revolution"?

title: Scale-UP Cardano's Community Hubs
description: How do we encourage Local Community Hubs to drive adoption and awareness of Cardano in the next 6 months?

title: DeFi and Microlending for Africa
description: How can we enable the creation of micro-lending and Defi dApp solutions that fit the African setting?

title: Grow with Catalyst
description:
What will make a person set-up a wallet and buy ADA?

How do you plan to maximize the potential of your business and attract new people ?

title: Overhaul Catalyst
description: How do we overhaul the Catalyst funding program so that it can scale?

title: Equip the Economically Excluded
description: How can Cardano provide the resources to enable economically excluded people to run their own projects ?

title: Governance Parameter Ideation
description: Can we encourage discussion regarding governance, that will result in changes to the funding process prior to the release of Voltaire?

title: Grow Africa, Grow Cardano
description:
How do we grow the Cardano ecosystem in Africa?

The same way we do everywhere, focused initiatives!

title: Anti-scam & anti-fraud campaign
description: Is there a way to outplay the scammer?

title: Tackle & solve impossible problems
description: How can we implement specific projects to rebuild trust, promote common interest and solve a difficult real-world problem?

title: Connecting Japan/日本 Community
description: How can we help the Japanese community to adopt Cardano and connect with the Catalyst community?

title: Climate Change: THE Challenge
description: Climate Change is humanities greatest challenge going forward. **How will Cardano contribute to solving this wicked problem?**

title: Seeding Cardano's Grassroots DeFi
description: How to encourage new teams to Deploy Defi Solutions on Cardano?

title: Local Agriculture Market
description: The idea is to favor the economy of small farmers.  By financing their production, through a social distribution fund.

title: Grow Global Economic Identities
description: How can the community work together to address challenges based on economic identity as opposed to geographic constraints?

title: Realfi
description: How do we integrate Cardano with the existing financial systems?

title: Developer ecosystem
description: How can we create a positive developer experience that helps the developer focus on building successful apps?

title: Funding for Traditional Businesses
description: Are you a non-crypto/blockchain business wanting to apply for funding in cryptocurrency? Would you like to put forward a proposal now?

title: Atala PRISM DID Mass-Scale Adoption
description: What type of solutions can drive mass-scale adoption of DID usage as an easy-to-use onramp to the Cardano ecosystem?

title: Remittances
description: How can we get remittances improved?

title: Proposer outreach
description: How can we encourage entrepreneurs from outside the Cardano ecosystem to submit proposals to Catalyst in the next two funds?

title: Distributed decision making
description: How can we help the Catalyst community to get better at distributed decision making within the next two Catalyst rounds?

title: Multilingual resources
description: How can we motivate non english speakers to learn and grow Cardano ecosystem in the next 3-6 months?

title: Improve and Grow Auditability
description: How to make the auditing process of funded proposals efficient, distributed and transparent?

title: DLT Entrepreneurship Toolbox
description: How can early stage entrepreneurs develop their skills to execute & communicate great ideas so voters/stakeholders value the project?

title: Metadata challenge
description: How can we utilize transaction metadata to solve real world problems?

title: DApps & Integrations
description: What applications will provide the most value for end users in 2021?
